item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using clusterProfiler and your publication will be featured here. 2019 Healthy infants harbor intestinal bacteria that protect against food allergy. Nature Medicine 2018 Comprehensive functional genomic resource and integrative model for the human brain. Science. 2018, 362(6420):eaat8464. RIG-I like receptor sensing of host RNAs facilitates the cell-intrinsic immune response to KSHV infection. Nature Communications. 2018, 9:4841. Disease-relevant transcriptional signatures identified in individual smooth muscle cells from healthy mouse vessels.
